name: Quick Stickman - Killing Game
description:
A deadly stick point and click game!

He's the quickest stick fighter in the West, East, North, and South, and he's had enough of those gangers in his neighborhood with corporate sponsorship trying to run things their way. It's not going to happen anymore, and he's going to be the one to change it. With his fists of righteous fury!

Click on the right spot to activate the killing machine animation. Good luck and have fun!
